pages.text: The $(4)Bloodlust Sigil$() offers a desperate, violent pact. It grants the wielder $(n)monstrous strength$(), allowing you to crush enemies with ease.
However, the human vessel was not meant to contain such raw, surging power. Every time you channel this $(4)primal rage$(), the force is so great that your own body begins to $(l)shatter$().
Using this sigil will $(c)inflict damage$() upon you as the price for your newfound lethality. It is a race to see who falls first: your enemy, or $(4)you$().
